title: Pomeranian
description: Dedicated to the affectionate and resourceful Pomeranian! This Smart Owner's Guide , created by the editors at Dog Fancy magazine, offers the most up-to-date and accurate information every dog owner needs to become a well-informed caregiver for their dog. Illustrated with color photographs of adorable puppies and handsome adults, this easy-to-read primer is designed in a modern, lively manner that readers will find user-friendly and entertaining. It offers a description of the Pomeranian's character and physical conformation, historical overview, and the breed's attributes as a companion dog. You'll find informative chapters on everything you need to Entertaining tidbits and smart advice fill up colorful sidebars in every chapter. Recipes, training, and care tips are highlighted in the "Try This" feature pages. The Resources section of the book includes lots of important contact information for breed-related organizations and rescues, practical guidance on traveling with dogs, information about identification, and guidance on locating qualified professionals to assist the dog owner, such as pet sitters, trainers, and boarding facilities. This information-packed Smart Owner's Guide is fully indexed.
author: Dog Fancy Magazine
